channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump names Warsh, Hassett as top Fed contenders, WSJ says
item.description: “I think the two Kevins are great,” he said. “I think there are a couple of other people that are great.”

item.title: The CEO of one of Asia’s largest co-working space providers says his business has more in common with hotels
item.description: “It's a hospitality business," JustCo CEO Kong Wan Sin tells Fortune.

item.title: What Keeps CEOs Up at Night—and Other Secrets of the C-Suite
item.description: Inc. held a ‘No Founders Allowed’ panel at this year’s Inc. 5000 Conference to get the inside scoop from c-suite executives.

item.title: A Brief History of Calibri, the ‘Woke’ Font
item.description: The designer behind Calibri weighs in on the decision to replace his font with Times New Roman as the official U.S. State Department typeface.

item.title: OpenAI’s Latest Model Is Scarily Good at These Important Work Functions
item.description: A panel of human judges decided if the model’s work matched or exceeded the output of a skilled human worker. Here’s what they found.

item.title: Trump says ‘starting’ land strikes over drugs in latest warning
item.description: “We knocked out 96% of the drugs coming in by water, and now we’re starting by land, and by land is a lot easier, and that’s going to start happening....

item.title: Arkansas drops PBS, citing costs and loss of federal funding
item.description: The fallout from the Trump administration’s dramatic cuts to American public media is only just beginning. The governing group that oversees public ed...

item.title: The Fed just ‘Trump-proofed’ itself with a unanimous move to preempt a potential leadership shake-up
item.description: “If I’m reading this properly, they just Trump-proofed the Fed.”

item.title: Dick Van Dyke turns 100: The iconic actor shares these longevity tips as he celebrates a milestone birthday
item.description: Humans are a unique species because of our collective knowledge of our own mortality. According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC...

item.title: High prices are souring the holiday cheer for most consumers, AP-NORC poll finds
item.description: This holiday season isn’t quite so merry for American shoppers as large shares are dipping into savings, scouring for bargains , and feeling like the ...

item.title: Lululemon Shakes Up Its Leadership Amid Slowed Growth
item.description: Calvin McDonald called the role his “dream job.”

item.title: ‘The question is really just how long it will take’: Over 2,000 gather at Humanoids Summit to meet the robots who may take their jobs someday
item.description: Researchers at McKinsey have counted about 50 companies that have raised at least $100 million to develop humanoids.

item.title: Some advice from Gen Z: Try Venmo-ing cash for Christmas
item.description: Personally, I can never bring myself to tell people that I’d rather forgo their gift and just get cash instead—or better yet, a Venmo money transfer. ...

item.title: Geminids peak 2025: A meteor shower will light up the December sky tonight. Here’s what time to look up
item.description: If the holiday hustle and bustle is stressing you out , the night sky is providing a perfect moment to pause and wonder at some majesty this weekend, ...

item.title: Home Depot Just Copied a Social Media Strategy of Its Biggest Rival
item.description: The two home improvement retailers seem to be targeting different audiences despite their shared tactics.
